<script>
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
  const counters = document.querySelectorAll(".stat-value");

  counters.forEach(counter => {
    const target = parseInt(counter.dataset.target, 10);
    const suffix = counter.dataset.suffix || "";
    const duration = 1500; // total animation time in ms
    const startTime = performance.now();

    function update(currentTime) {
      const elapsed = currentTime - startTime;
      const progress = Math.min(elapsed / duration, 1);
      const value = Math.floor(progress * target);

      counter.textContent = value.toLocaleString() + suffix;

      if (progress < 1) {
        requestAnimationFrame(update);
      } else {
        counter.textContent = target.toLocaleString() + suffix;
      }
    }

    requestAnimationFrame(update);
  });
});
</script>

```{=html}  
<!-- ===============================
     ABOUT THE LAUNCHPAD
================================ -->
<!-- ===============================
     ABOUT K-AGTECH LAUNCHPAD
================================ -->

<section id="about" class="about-section">

  <div class="about-container">

    <h2 class="about-title">About K-AgTech LaunchPad</h2>

    <p class="about-text">
      The K-AgTech LaunchPad is a flagship agri-innovation initiative supported under
      NABARD’s Rural Business Incubation Centre (RBIC) programme. It represents the
      largest NABARD-funded project hosted at Kerala Agricultural University (KAU),
      bringing together academia, global research expertise, and industry engagement
      to strengthen India’s agri-innovation ecosystem.
    </p>

    <p class="about-text">
      Established through a strategic collaboration between Kerala Agricultural
      University (KAU), Western Sydney University (WSU), and industry partners, the
      LaunchPad is designed to address pressing agricultural challenges through
      technology-driven solutions, applied research, and enterprise development.
    </p>

    <p class="about-text">
      More than an incubation centre, the K-AgTech LaunchPad functions as a catalyst
      for change—supporting farmers, agripreneurs, and rural communities by enabling
      the adoption of advanced AgTech solutions and translating research outcomes
      into real-world impact.
    </p>

    <ul class="about-list">
      <li>End-to-end incubation support for start-ups, from ideation to market readiness</li>
      <li>Value addition and product diversification to enhance farmers’ income</li>
      <li>Entrepreneurial capacity building that connects research with industry needs</li>
      <li>AI-enabled smart climate adaptation technologies for resilient agriculture</li>
      <li>Promotion of women-led enterprises to foster inclusive and sustainable growth</li>
    </ul>

    <h3 class="about-subtitle">Expected Impact</h3>

    <p class="about-text">
      The LaunchPad aims to stimulate economic growth by nurturing start-ups and
      Small and Medium Enterprises (SMEs), strengthening climate resilience through
      smart agricultural practices, and enabling global knowledge exchange through
      WSU-led collaborations.
    </p>

    <p class="about-text">
      By establishing a supportive entrepreneurial ecosystem and a state-of-the-art
      incubation facility, the programme seeks to accelerate AI-integrated precision
      agriculture, promote scalable agripreneurship, and contribute meaningfully to
      the transformation of Kerala’s agricultural landscape.
    </p>

  </div>

</section>
```  
```{=html}

     GALLERY SECTION
================================ -->

<section id="gallery" class="gallery-section">

  <div class="gallery-container">

    <h2 class="gallery-title">Gallery</h2>
    <p class="gallery-subtitle">
      Moments from the K-AgTech LaunchPad journey
    </p>

    <!-- Tabs -->
    <div class="gallery-tabs">
      <button class="gallery-tab active" data-tab="inaugural">
        Inaugural Session
      </button>
      <button class="gallery-tab" data-tab="programmes">
        Programmes & Activities
      </button>
    </div>

    <!-- Inaugural Slider -->
    <div class="gallery-panel active" id="inaugural">
      <div class="gallery-slider">
        <button class="slider-btn prev" data-type="inaugural">❮</button>
        <img id="inaugural-img"
             src="assets/gallery/inaugural1.webp"
             alt="Inaugural session">
        <button class="slider-btn next" data-type="inaugural">❯</button>
      </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Programmes Slider -->
    <div class="gallery-panel" id="programmes">
      <div class="gallery-slider">
        <button class="slider-btn prev" data-type="programmes">‹</button>
        <img id="programmes-img"
             src="assets/gallery/programmes/klp01.jpg"
             alt="Programme activity">
        <button class="slider-btn next" data-type="programmes">›</button>
      </div>
    </div>

  </div>

</section>

<!-- ===============================
     GALLERY SCRIPT
================================ -->

<script>
const inauguralImages = [
  "assets/gallery/inaugural1.webp",
  "assets/gallery/inaugural2.webp",
  "assets/gallery/inaugural3.webp",
  "assets/gallery/inaugural4.webp"
];

const programmeImages = [
  "assets/gallery/programmes/klp01.jpg",
  "assets/gallery/programmes/klp02.jpg"
];

let inauguralIndex = 0;
let programmeIndex = 0;

/* Slider navigation */
document.querySelectorAll(".slider-btn").forEach(btn => {
  btn.addEventListener("click", () => {
    const type = btn.dataset.type;
    const next = btn.classList.contains("next");

    if (type === "inaugural") {
      inauguralIndex = next
        ? (inauguralIndex + 1) % inauguralImages.length
        : (inauguralIndex - 1 + inauguralImages.length) % inauguralImages.length;

      document.getElementById("inaugural-img").src =
        inauguralImages[inauguralIndex];
    }

    if (type === "programmes") {
      programmeIndex = next
        ? (programmeIndex + 1) % programmeImages.length
        : (programmeIndex - 1 + programmeImages.length) % programmeImages.length;

      document.getElementById("programmes-img").src =
        programmeImages[programmeIndex];
    }
  });
});

/* Tab switching */
document.querySelectorAll(".gallery-tab").forEach(tab => {
  tab.addEventListener("click", () => {
    document.querySelectorAll(".gallery-tab").forEach(t => t.classList.remove("active"));
    document.querySelectorAll(".gallery-panel").forEach(p => p.classList.remove("active"));

    tab.classList.add("active");
    document.getElementById(tab.dataset.tab).classList.add("active");
  });
});
</script> 

<script>
/* ===============================
   SWIPE SUPPORT (MOBILE)
================================ */

function addSwipeSupport(imgElement, images, indexRef, updateFn) {
  let startX = 0;

  imgElement.addEventListener("touchstart", e => {
    startX = e.touches[0].clientX;
  });

  imgElement.addEventListener("touchend", e => {
    const endX = e.changedTouches[0].clientX;
    const diff = startX - endX;

    if (Math.abs(diff) > 50) {
      updateFn(diff > 0 ? "next" : "prev");
    }
  });
}

/* Inaugural swipe */
addSwipeSupport(
  document.getElementById("inaugural-img"),
  inauguralImages,
  () => inauguralIndex,
  direction => {
    inauguralIndex =
      direction === "next"
        ? (inauguralIndex + 1) % inauguralImages.length
        : (inauguralIndex - 1 + inauguralImages.length) % inauguralImages.length;

    document.getElementById("inaugural-img").src =
      inauguralImages[inauguralIndex];
  }
);

/* Programme swipe */
addSwipeSupport(
  document.getElementById("programmes-img"),
  programmeImages,
  () => programmeIndex,
  direction => {
    programmeIndex =
      direction === "next"
        ? (programmeIndex + 1) % programmeImages.length
        : (programmeIndex - 1 + programmeImages.length) % programmeImages.length;

    document.getElementById("programmes-img").src =
      programmeImages[programmeIndex];
  }
);
</script>


```
